body:
Loving Videogames Again

Guys let me tell ya, E3 2019 was awesome, really it was. Xbox had a great show, Nintendo Direct was fantastic, no Sony which is just weird to be honest, hopefully it’s just a one time thing and they come back next year. I cant imagine the insane amount of work it takes for these companies to prepare for E3 though, so I’m not mad but Xbox man himself Phil Spencer said E3 hurts without Sony and that’s true.

I love all the consoles and I’ve always been more of a console gamer because they are cheaper, and my day job is in IT the last thing I want to do when I get home is mess with technology. But anyway, I’m in love with playing videogames again and it really began to grow last summer.

There was a time when I thought I would just be done playing videogames, maybe I had finally outgrown it, but the beauty is you can’t outgrow them. The stories are so rich now, online multiplayer offers robust options, it’s no longer strictly pvp online, which is great because it’s a great way to get discouraged and give up on a game. Pvp is fantastic, but I don’t live off of it like I used to. For me, pvp games were the only reason I bought games. I was all about the Halo franchise, call of duty up to MW2, and games like that. But if you noticed, Halo gained a co op element, call of duty has one too, that’s where games really shine nowadays.

As great as adding options online is, developers saw a shift and they saw people playing co op more, and yes playing with friends in a story will make it better if the story lacks, but if co op was becoming so popular, why not focus on story?

This is just me spewing crap on my phone keyboard, but think about it. When you see games like The Witcher, no multiplayer but hundreds of hours could be sunk into it and what came from that? Gwent! A competitive digital card game and it’s stellar.

Games like GTA, Ghost Recon Wildlands, Rainbow Six Siege, Borderlands have changed the way we play multiplayer and have forced developers to make a great story, it’s okay for a game to focus on single player, if it’s great it will sell. Back to The Witcher 3, no multiplayer but me and a couple friends would talk about it all the time and wonder where each other was in the game. How cool is that? So I will say the game that made me fall in love all over again last summer was when I sunk a ton of hours in The Witcher 3, and actually another game GTA online!

What games do you love? What games can you play over and over again?

summary: Slippy’s Unexpected Visit Lylat City - Day 3 It was a rough day at the Police station and the newest detective, Slippy Toad,...
caption:
Slippy’s Unexpected Visit
Lylat City - Day 3

It was a rough day at the Police station and the newest detective, Slippy Toad, left with turbulent emotions. Seeking support, he pays a visit to his father and uncle’s workshop.

summary:
As of now I don’t own a switch, but you had better believe I’m going to play New Horizons once it comes out.
Those who interfere...
body:
As of now I don’t own a switch, but you had better believe I’m going to play New Horizons once it comes out.

Those who interfere with the path to personal enlightenment will suffocate in the darkness of my shadow as I surpass them.

summary: Where the heck is the ARMS comic book?
title: Where the heck is the ARMS comic book?
body: It was delayed until January of 2019 and then we never heard from it again. I’m pretty confident that we’re never going to see it or any other outings from ARMS ever again.

summary: NPD: The Nintendo Switch Was The Best-Selling Hardware Platform Of May 2019
title: NPD: The Nintendo Switch Was The Best-Selling Hardware Platform Of May 2019
body:
NPD: The Nintendo Switch Was The Best-Selling Hardware Platform Of May 2019

It’s not just software that NPD covers in their monthly report. We also get some data on video gaming hardware, and it was another great month for the Nintendo Switch. The Nintendo Switchwas the best-selling console of May 2019, and it “remained the only hardware platform that saw growth and the continued victor year-to-date both in terms of dollars and units”. Sadly, according to NPD analyst…

View On WordPress

blog.name: cwgames
blog.title: Playing videos games since 1990
blog.description: Hello my name is C.W! and I've been working at my job for over 11 years but I still love playing video games in my spare time. All I do here is Reblog stuff that I like, and post stuff about video games that I have played. I do enjoy reading good webcomics (also huge Ganondorf fan in AU comics) and seeing good clean art :)

summary: There is a The Legend Of Zelda maker for PC users. If anyone has tried it, how long does it take you to finish your own game? I...
body:
There is a The Legend Of Zelda maker for PC users.

If anyone has tried it, how long does it take you to finish your own game?

I haven’t used a PC computer for a long while and it interests me in knowing such a thing exists. I’m sure it’s fun, but time consuming.

reblog.comment:
